tasks.instruction: Build a desktop application for LLM-powered Vastu-aware architectural design system with both interior and exterior design capabilities. Use the PRD at /workspace/vastu_architect_ai_prd.md and system design at /workspace/vastu_architect_ai_system_design.md as reference. Create a desktop app using Electron with React frontend that includes: 1) Local LLM integration (Ollama support), 2) Natural language input interface for design commands, 3) 3D visualization canvas for interior/exterior designs using Three.js, 4) Vastu compliance checking engine, 5) Material and furniture libraries, 6) Project management with local SQLite database, 7) Export capabilities (CAD formats, images), 8) Local file system integration. Start with core MVP features: natural language design input, basic 3D rendering, and Vastu rule validation. Ensure the app runs completely offline with local LLM support.
